I would rate a 9/10. the graphics are amazing, valve hired amazing voice actors, and I love that you can make your own test chambers. the humor is on point and the puzzles are just the right amount of difficult. the boss at the end is amazing and basically, this game is one of the best. I do have one gripe, and that's that the Mac version won't work for my version of computer. I had to use a family member's computer to play, but that's my only gripe. I have found a few bugs, though. this game is amazing, even without ever playing the first one.

Portal 2 is a lot of fun. That's all I can say about it.
Custom Maps in this game are a ton of fun, whether it's just standard "Portal" gameplay, or even racing.
The racing modes are a ton of fun, with the selection of routes and traps on the maps that I've played.
Anyways, that's about it.

~ If you got this far, you're a legend.
Thanks for reading my review of Portal 2!
this is THE best game on steam!

First pc game I ever got but it could never work on the family computer. Years later I got it again and was able to play. Great atmosphere and smooth (slightly stream lined) game play but over all an awesome experience with amazing performances by Stephen Merchant and J.K. Simmons

Absolute masterpiece and best puzzle game I own. The story telling is great, and this is another classic by Valve. The portal aspect is very unique and challenging and the game aged very well. The multiplayer is fun as well and a fun bonding experience.

Evidentemente es mejor en muchos aspectos con respecto a su predecesor, ha sabido llevar de mejor manera gran parte de las cosas que ya habÃ­amos visto en la primer entrega.

Es un tÃ­tulo mas largo, con nuevos tipos de retos, se introduce la luz sÃ³lida, los geles propulsores entre otras cosas. Y entre todas estas implementaciones, tenemos nuevos personajes, algunos no se les ven directamente, pero forman parte de la trama de manera directa o indirecta. Sin embargo me parece que algunos problemas de Portal 1 se arrastran a este tÃ­tulo, a pesar de que el tÃ­tulo tiene todo un capÃ­tulo dedicado al origen de Aperture, no deja las cosas muy claras.

Sin duda alguna lo recomiendo si te gustÃ³ el primer tÃ­tulo, pero este juego va mas que nada de repetir la formula adictiva de crear portales que caracteriza al primer juego

This game is one of the best games I have ever played in my life. The graphics are beautiful even by today's standards. The characters are amazingly written and hilarious.
